alert.note: Alert for Barry; Lawrence; Newton (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 13 at 9:01PM CDT until August 13 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Newton County in southwestern Missouri... Northwestern Barry County in southwestern Missouri... Southwestern Lawrence County in southwestern Missouri... * Until 945 PM CDT. * At 900 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Neosho, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Neosho, Monett, Granby, Pierce City, Diamond, Newtonia, Wentworth, Stark City and Ritchey. This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 24 and 28. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
